name: create_habit
attributes: # [doc = " 習慣作成：ID・説明を受け取り、最終達成時刻を 0、active を true で初期化"]
body: * ctx . accounts . habit = Habit { owner : ctx . accounts . user . key () , bump , habit_id , description , last_completed_ts : 0 , active : true , } ;

name: complete_habit
attributes: # [doc = " 習慣達成登録：last_completed_ts に現在のタイムスタンプを設定"]
body: let h = & mut ctx . accounts . habit ;
h . last_completed_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: toggle_active
attributes: # [doc = " 習慣の有効／無効切替：active フラグをトグル"]
body: let h = & mut ctx . accounts . habit ;
